Scripts.OnLoad:
local ConditionDur = self:GetParent().ConditionDur ConditionDur.text:SetParent(self) -- This is evil and lazy. So, so lazy. ConditionDur.text:SetPoint("LEFT", 2, 0) ConditionDur.text:SetPoint("RIGHT", ConditionDur)

TMW.IE:CreateSettingFrameFromData(self, { setting = "UnConditionDurEnabled", label = "", title = ENABLE, tooltip = TMW.L["GENERIC_NUMREQ_CHECK_DESC"]:format(TMW.L["CONDITION_TIMERS_FAIL_DESC"]:gsub("^%u", strlower)), })
